I'm running win 7 and it didnt work until i did this

Right click ur dekstop icon(game)->properties
->compatibility-> (tick) run in 640 x 480 screen resolution

The good settings for Win7:

Right click -> Properties -> Compatibility:

- XP SP2
- Disable visual themes

Now play the game.
